content:
Closing on Pizza Day

Been writing a lot lately ‚Äî not for clicks, but to process, reflect, and share what‚Äôs been stirring in me.
The response so far has been deeply encouraging. A few sats here and there might not seem like much, but to me, every zap is a signal: ‚ÄúI see you. Keep going.‚Äù

I‚Äôm this close to hitting 1,000 sats by Bitcoin Pizza Day ‚Äî just 90 to go.
If something I‚Äôve written has resonated, feel free to zap and help me cross that line.

Not begging ‚Äî just stacking. üçï

Post written with help from ChatGPT.
